comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.text:
We should turn off incremental linking on release builds (and maybe opt builds if we think it might effect Talos)

"To ensure that your final release build does not contain padding or thunks, link your program nonincrementally." - quoth MSDN

This should probably block Firefox 5 ...
comments.raw_text:
We should turn off incremental linking on release builds (and maybe opt builds if we think it might effect Talos)

"To ensure that your final release build does not contain padding or thunks, link your program nonincrementally." - quoth MSDN

This should probably block Firefox 5 ...
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com

comments.text: Per conversations at the all hands, we shouldn't be doing this because PGO should be overriding incremental linking, but we need to verify that we're not doing it before we ship.
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.raw_text: Per conversations at the all hands, we shouldn't be doing this because PGO should be overriding incremental linking, but we need to verify that we're not doing it before we ship.
comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com

comments.creator: jpr@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Kyle is there a performance hit either in the released application, or for build times?  Is there more details why this is needed for FF5 instead of six weeks later for FF6?
comments.text: Kyle is there a performance hit either in the released application, or for build times?  Is there more details why this is needed for FF5 instead of six weeks later for FF6?
comments.author: jpr@mozilla.com

comments.text: There is a potential slowdown in the released binary.
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.raw_text: There is a potential slowdown in the released binary.
comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com
asa@mozilla.com
comments.text: Not going to block on this. Will take the possible perf boost for a future release.
comments.creator: asa@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Not going to block on this. Will take the possible perf boost for a future release.
